properties.displayName: MDE Alert - Suspicious sequence of exploration activities
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection"
| extend ep=parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend MitreTechnique = ep.["MitreTechniques"]
| where AlertName == "Suspicious sequence of exploration activities"
| where MitreTechnique == "T1016;T1018;T1049;T1057;T1059.001;T1087;T1135"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Alert - Suspicious sequence of exploration activities
